messages.subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Screen Time for Children, And Harry Potter Headaches too
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/31/03 11:36:28 AM Central Standard Time, ... ##################### If you thought your kids were spending too much time in front of the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/31/03 11:36:28 AM Central Standard Time,
shyrley@... writes:
>KIDS SPEND AS MUCH TIME WITH TV,
>COMPUTERS & VIDEO GAMES
>AS PLAYING OUTSIDE
#####################

If you thought your kids were spending too much time in front of the TV and
video games, then watch out for Harry Potter! It's a headache epidemic! (Well
only an epidemic if you consider one doctor and three kids an epidemic. <beg>)
Daily Times - Site Edition

~Nancy ;o)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
